description:
Talk to Books was a new way to explore ideas and discover books. Select one of
        the samples to view its archived search results.
title: Talk to Books
introduction: Talk to Books was an experiment in using a neural language model to search through a large collection of books. Launched in 2018, it delighted millions of users who found that you really could converse with books in a way never imagined. The experiment proved the effectiveness of language models and inspired features in various Google products.
features: Search through a large collection of books using a neural language model
Converse with books in a unique way
Demonstrated the effectiveness of language models

faqs.question: Is Talk to Books still available?
faqs.answer: No, Talk to Books will be closing down immediately.

faqs.question: Where can I find a similar AI experience now?
faqs.answer: You can check out bard.google.com for a new kind of AI experience that knows a lot about books.

targetPeople: Users interested in conversing with books using AI
